page.title: 12A SCHOOLGIRL'S DAY CONTD.
page.content: IN P.E.we have the apparatus out and we learn to do things like stretching and doing twists and turns and controlling the way we move our bodies around.After P.E. it is break and when we come in we may paint or draw. We then clear away our things and go home at 3.30 if there is no club activity. I walk home with my friend Christina who comes to my house for tea on Thursday.When we get home we watch the television for a while,later we have something on toast for tea then we get changed.At 5.00pm.we go disco dancing at Peterbrook School.There we learn new dances and practise the ones that we know. I go home in Christina's dad's car and sometimes I watch "Tomorrow's World" and "Top of the Pops".I go to bed at 9.00 and then read for about twenty minutes before I go to sleep.
